description: Carestream Vue RIS, RIS Client Builds: Version 11.2 and prior running on a Windows 8.1 machine with IIS/7.5. When contacting a Carestream server where there is no Oracle TNS listener available, users will trigger an HTTP 500 error, leaking technical information an attacker could use to initiate a more elaborate attack.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: RIS Client Builds: Version 11.2 and prior running on a Windows 8.1 machine with IIS/7.5
